


\question What is/are the requirements for refarming of spectrum?

\begin{choices}

  \choice Spectrum sharing can be a part of it, if the national regulator allows
	% MOTIVATION : This is called spectrum pooling

  \correctchoice Licenses are technology neutral
	% MOTIVATION : 

  \correctchoice Operators have a minimum amount of spectrum each
	% MOTIVATION : 

  \choice Affects the system efficiency.
	% MOTIVATION : This is caused by the unwanted frequency generated by secondor third order intermodulation distortion the devices.

\end{choices}
